definition: seat/base/stand/CL:個|个[ge4]/classifier for buildings, mountains and similar immovable objects
"house on a cliff" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 53), occurring in 店, 序, 底 etc
to sit/to take a seat/to take (a bus, airplane etc)/to bear fruit/variant of 座[zuo4]
to have an informal discussion/CL:次[ci4],個|个[ge4]
Aries (constellation and sign of the zodiac)
Gemini (constellation and sign of the zodiac)
Leo (constellation and sign of the zodiac)
Scorpio or Scorpius (constellation and sign of the zodiac)
lit. a banquet with no empty seats/full house/capacity crowd/standing room only
Libra (constellation and sign of the zodiac)

sentences.english: Finally, modification of the lathe assembly is discussed about.
sentences.chinese: 最后对筘座组合体的改进进行了探讨。

sentences.english: ChengKang found driving end be chafed, cognizance is concise.
sentences.chinese: 承康发现座驾车尾被擦花，认定是简洁所为。

sentences.english: The machine uses the worm-type supporting base with good rigidity and high precision.
sentences.chinese: 本机台采用蜗杆式支撑座，钢性好，精度高。

sentences.english: The area that Miaka pointed to was the region where the constellations of Cancer and Gemini shone.
sentences.chinese: 美朱指着的那片天空正是双子星座和巨蟹星座。

sentences.english: The audience in the seats craned forward to look at her.
sentences.chinese: 座上的观众伸着脖子看她。

sentences.english: Passengers traveling on the line pay 555 yuan for a one-way, economy-class ticket between Beijing and Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 京沪高铁单程二等座的票价为555元。

sentences.english: Actually, there are 5 functioning churches in Etchmiadzin.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，在埃奇米阿津有5座仍然开放的教堂。

sentences.english: May your eminence forgive me for this crude answer.
sentences.chinese: 请上座原谅我粗率的回答。

sentences.english: The aisle seats are all booked.
We have good service in our park and a four star-rated hotel is being set up.
sentences.chinese: 园区接待环境良好，正在兴建1座四星级酒店。

sentences.english: Your child should not save seats in the lunchroom.
sentences.chinese: 孩子不可以在午餐室占座。

sentences.english: Ball joint housing is an outer ring of radial spherical plain bearing, made of zinc base alloy.
sentences.chinese: 球头座为向心关节轴承的外圈，由锌基合金制成。
这个街区拥有200座风格不一的日式建筑。

sentences.english: In total, China will build seven of these mega-wind farms.
sentences.chinese: 中国将总共建造7座类似容量的风电场。

sentences.english: The usual mechanism which gives the reed its motion is known AS the lay.
sentences.chinese: 驱动钢筘运动的机件通常称为筘座。

sentences.english: He was sitting on the grass, very peaceful, smiling.
sentences.chinese: 他端坐在玻璃座上，非常安详，面带微笑。

definition: Xinjian county in Nanchang 南昌, Jiangxi
to be situated/to be located (of a building)
to tower/standing tall and upright (of large building)
to establish/to found/to set up/to build/to construct
